data.message: So this guy messaged me saying I won 500.000.00, I think it is a scam, but I need it to be real. I want to start a homeless people/animal rescue and train therapy/service animals. I want it to be real, but from what I am reading here it is not. They want my name, address, and phone number and will send me a check or ATM card. His name is Urbina Javier Jr.. Does he work for you?

replies.message: Hey Rebecca, this looks like a hoax. We recommend that you do not provide any personal or financial information to the sender and report the spam to us by following these steps: http://on.fb.me/1V2KPBh. Thanks for helping us keep Facebook a safe place! -Nancy
I did report him. :) Thank you.
